Choose the appropriate PR template from the `Preview` tab by clicking one of the links below:

- [Feature](?expand=1&template=feature.md)
- [Bug Fix](?expand=1&template=bugfix.md)
- [Hotfix](?expand=1&template=hotfix.md)
- [Documentation](?expand=1&template=documentation.md)
- [Refactor](?expand=1&template=refactor.md)

Note: If the links do not work in your UI, click "Choose a template" and select the appropriate template manually.
